languages.text: {n}Вид-запись обрывается, а из комм-бусины снова доносится голос Мастера вокса:{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Служители Омниссии более не могли сдерживать голод машинного духа. Мне очень жаль. Надеюсь, вы успели просмотреть вид-сообщение до конца".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вид-запись обрывается, а из комм-бусины снова доносится голос Мастера Вокса:{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Служители Омниссии более не могли сдерживать голод машинного духа. Мне очень жаль. Надеюсь, вы успели просмотреть вид-сообщение до конца".

languages.text: {n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."
languages.original_text: {n}Вид-запись обрывается, а из комм-бусины снова доносится голос Мастера вокса:{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Служители Омниссии более не могли сдерживать голод машинного духа. Мне очень жаль. Надеюсь, вы успели просмотреть вид-сообщение до конца".

traits.locale_text: {n}The vid-recording cuts short and your hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead:{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

{n}The vid-recording cuts short and your hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead:{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

{n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

{n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

{n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

languages.text: {n}视讯记录突然消失，通讯珠中传来了音阵大师的声音。{/n}“非常抱歉，舰长大人，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人再也无法抑制饥饿的机魂。希望那条视讯信息您顺利地看到了最后。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}视讯记录突然消失，通讯珠中传来了音阵大师的声音。{/n}“非常抱歉，舰长大人，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人再也无法抑制饥饿的机魂。希望那条视讯信息您顺利地看到了最后。”

languages.text: {n}L'enregistrement est interrompu et vous entendez la voix de la maîtresse-vox dans votre communicateur :{/n} « Je suis désolée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ne sont pas parvenus à contenir la faim de l'esprit de la machine plus longtemps. J'espère que vous avez pu voir le message jusqu'au bout. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'enregistrement est interrompu et vous entendez la voix de la maîtresse-vox dans votre communicateur :{/n} « Je suis désolée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie ne sont pas parvenus à contenir la faim de l'esprit de la machine plus longtemps. J'espère que vous avez pu voir le message jusqu'au bout. »

languages.text: {n}La videograbación se corta y tu cuenta de comunicaciones reproduce la voz de la maestra de vocos.{/n} «Lo siento mucho, Lord Capitán. Los sirvientes del Omnissiah no han podido refrenar el hambre del espíritu máquina por más tiempo. Espero que haya podido ver el videomensaje entero».
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}La videograbación se corta y tu cuenta de comunicación reproduce la voz de la maestra de vocos.{/n} «Lo siento mucho, Lord Capitán. Los sirvientes del Omnissiah no han podido refrenar el hambre del espíritu máquina por más tiempo. Espero que haya podido ver el videomensaje entero».

languages.text: {n}ビデオ録画が途切れ、通信機からヴォクス・マスターの声が聞こえる。{/n}「大変申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。万機神の従者たちは、もはや機械精霊の飢えを抑えることができませんでした。最後までビデオメッセージをご覧いただけましたでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}ビデオ録画が途切れ、通信機からヴォクス・マスターの声が聞こえる。{/n}「大変申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。万機神の従者たちは、もはや機械精霊の飢えを抑えることができませんでした。最後までビデオメッセージをご覧いただけましたでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}Die Vid-Aufnahme bricht ab und über deinen Voxstecker ertönt die Stimme der Voxmeisterin.{/n} "Tut mir wirklich leid, Lord Captain. Die Diener des Omnissiah konnten den Hunger des Maschinengeists nicht länger bändigen. Ich hoffe, Ihr konntet die Vid-Nachricht bis zum Schluss sehen."
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Vid-Aufnahme bricht ab und über deinen Voxstecker ertönt die Stimme der Voxmeisterin.{/n} "Tut mir wirklich leid, Lord Captain. Die Diener des Omnissiah konnten den Hunger des Maschinengeists nicht länger bändigen. Ich hoffe, Ihr konntet die Vid-Nachricht bis zum Schluss sehen."

languages.text: {n}Video kaydı yarıda kesiliyor, mikro telsizinden Voks Üstadı'nın sesi geliyor.{/n} "Çok üzgünüm Lord Kaptan. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, makine ruhunun iştahına ancak bu kadar mâni olabildi. Umarım video mesajını bütünüyle görebilmişsinizdir."
languages.original_text: {n}The vid-recording cuts short and you hear the Vox Master's voice in your comm-bead.{/n} "I am very sorry, Lord Captain. The servants of the Omnissiah could no longer restrain the machine spirit's hunger. I hope you were able to see the vid-message through to the end."
